means: 胡子刮光的，无胡子的，不蓄须的

sentence.Network_en: Men should either be clean shaven, mustached or wear full beards.
sentence.Network_cn: 男人要么把脸刮光, 只蓄八字须,要么蓄上全副的胡须,怎能这样不伦不类呢.

sentence.Network_en: He was clean shaven and young and had merry, kind eyes.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个刚刮过脸 、 眼神显得愉快而和气的青年人.

sentence.Network_en: He was clean - shaven, and his mouth was very attractive.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的脸刮得很干净, 口角很富有诱惑力.

entry.tran: 胡子刮干净的；不蓄须的
entry.def: If a man is clean-shaven, he does not have a beard or a moustache.
